message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.DL, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper discusses the task of recommending citations for scientific texts, which falls under the field of information retrieval (IR) and natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.IR and cs.CL are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also mentions the use of machine learning techniques, which suggests the sub-categories of cs.DL, cs.LG, and cs.AI as likely as well.
